Title: Hotel Rwanda
Overview: Inspired by true events, this film takes place in Rwanda in the 1990s when more than a million Tutsis were killed in a genocide that went mostly unnoticed by the rest of the world. Hotel owner Paul Rusesabagina houses over a thousand refuges in his hotel in attempt to save their lives.
Tagline: When the world closed its eyes, he opened his arms.
production_companies: Lions Gate Films, United Artists, Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa, Endgame Entertainment, Miracle Pictures, Sixth Sense Productions, Mikado Film, Inside Track Films
Cast: Don Cheadle, Sophie Okonedo, Nick Nolte
